title: Jump to Serviços section from navbar
description: Verifies that clicking the 'Serviços' navbar anchor scrolls to the Services section and shows its header.

title: Jump to Contato section from navbar (success path)
description: Verifies that clicking the 'Contato' navbar anchor scrolls to the Contact section and shows its header.

title: Click Início returns to top/hero content
description: Verifies that clicking 'Início' brings the user back to the top section of the page.

title: Jump to Especialista section from navbar
description: Verifies that clicking 'Especialista' scrolls to the specialist section and its heading is visible.

title: Jump to Galeria section from navbar
description: Verifies that clicking 'Galeria' scrolls to the gallery section and its heading is visible.

title: Jump to Depoimentos section from navbar
description: Verifies that clicking 'Depoimentos' scrolls to the testimonials section and its heading is visible.

title: Navbar remains accessible after scrolling (sticky behavior)
description: Verifies that the navbar remains visible after navigating to a lower section so users can continue jumping between sections.

title: Contato anchor target missing: remain at top and show visual error indication (if applicable)
description: Verifies the defined error/edge behavior when the Contact anchor target cannot be found: page does not scroll and a visible error indication appears.

title: Hero displays primary title and WhatsApp CTA on the landing page
description: Verifies the hero section renders with the expected headline and a visible WhatsApp scheduling CTA.

steps.description: Verify the main hero title text is visible
Verify element "WhatsApp" button in the hero section is visible

title: Hero background animation/visual layer is present
description: Verifies a visible animated/visual background element is present in the hero section.

steps.description: Verify element "Hero background animation" is visible

title: Clicking Hero WhatsApp CTA attempts to open WhatsApp chat (URL intent check)
description: Verifies the CTA click results in navigation toward a WhatsApp deep link (wa.me / api.whatsapp.com) for a prefilled message.

steps.description: Verify element "WhatsApp" button in the hero section is visible
Click on the "WhatsApp" button in the hero section

title: WhatsApp deep link includes an encoded prefilled message parameter
description: Verifies the WhatsApp link includes a text/message parameter indicating a prefilled message is being passed.

steps.description: Click on the "WhatsApp" button in the hero section

title: Fallback modal appears when WhatsApp cannot be opened and shows clinic phone number
description: Verifies a user-visible fallback modal appears and displays the clinic phone number when WhatsApp is unavailable/blocked.

steps.description: Click on the "WhatsApp" button in the hero section
Verify element "WhatsApp fallback" modal is visible
Verify element "Clinic phone number" is visible

title: Fallback modal can be dismissed
description: Verifies the fallback modal can be closed and the user returns to the landing page hero content.

steps.description: Click on the "WhatsApp" button in the hero section
Verify element "WhatsApp fallback" modal is visible
Click on the "Close" button in the modal
Verify element "WhatsApp fallback" modal is not visible
Verify element "WhatsApp" button in the hero section is visible

title: Hero CTA is usable after scrolling away and back (persisting visibility/state)
description: Verifies the hero CTA remains available and functional after the user scrolls and returns to the hero area.

steps.description: Verify element "WhatsApp" button in the hero section is visible
Scroll to the middle of the page
Scroll to the top of the page
Verify element "WhatsApp" button in the hero section is visible
Click on the "WhatsApp" button in the hero section

title: View specialist profile details in the Especialista section
description: Verifies the specialist section is reachable from the home page and shows key identity and credential details.

steps.description: Verify text "Dra. Jaqueline Ronchi Soares" is visible
Verify an element "Qualifications list" is visible
Verify an element "Professional photo" is visible

title: Open specialist photo in a modal from the Especialista section
description: Verifies clicking the specialist photo enlarges it in a modal overlay.

steps.description: Verify an element "Photo modal" is visible
Verify an element "Enlarged specialist photo" is visible
Verify an element "Photo modal" is not visible

title: Close the enlarged photo modal using an on-screen close control
description: Verifies the photo modal can be closed using a visible close button/control after opening.

steps.description: Verify an element "Photo modal" is visible
Click on the "Close" control in the photo modal
Verify an element "Photo modal" is not visible

title: Especialista section renders without missing key text content
description: Verifies the section does not appear blank and includes multiple pieces of visible profile information.

steps.description: Verify an element "Credentials/qualifications content block" is visible
Verify an element "Professional photo" is visible

title: View Services section on the home page
description: Verifies the Services section is visible on the landing page and contains service cards users can browse.

steps.description: Verify at least one service card is visible
Verify a service card shows a treatment name and a short description

title: Click service card without hovering first still opens details/CTA
description: Verifies users on touch devices (no hover) can click a service card and still reach details or a call-to-action.

steps.description: Click a visible service card without hovering
Verify a service details view or call-to-action area is visible
Verify text "Agendar" or "WhatsApp" or "Contato" is visible

title: Service card details/CTA can be dismissed or exited without breaking the page
description: Verifies the user can exit the service details/CTA state (if presented as a modal/expanded panel) and return to browsing services.

steps.description: Verify a service details view or call-to-action area is visible
Verify the Services section is visible

title: Image carousel advances to the next image using the next arrow
description: Verifies the gallery carousel can move forward and shows a different image after clicking next.

steps.description: Verify element "Gallery image carousel" is visible
Verify element "Current carousel image" is visible
Click on the carousel "Next" arrow button
Verify element "Current carousel image" is visible

title: Image carousel moves back to the previous image using the previous arrow
description: Verifies the gallery carousel can move backward and remains functional for reverse navigation.

steps.description: Verify element "Gallery image carousel" is visible
Click on the carousel "Next" arrow button
Click on the carousel "Previous" arrow button
Verify element "Current carousel image" is visible
Verify element "Gallery image carousel" is visible

title: Carousel continues to advance across multiple next clicks
description: Verifies repeated forward navigation does not break the carousel and continues to show images.

steps.description: Verify element "Gallery image carousel" is visible
Click on the carousel "Next" arrow button
Click on the carousel "Next" arrow button
Click on the carousel "Next" arrow button
Verify element "Current carousel image" is visible
Verify element "Gallery image carousel" is visible

title: Before/after comparison slider responds to moving the handle toward 'after'
description: Verifies the before/after slider handle can be moved and the visible comparison changes toward the after image.

steps.description: Verify element "Before/after comparison slider" is visible
Verify element "Comparison slider handle" is visible
Click on the "After" side of the comparison slider track
Verify element "After image area" is visible
Verify element "Comparison slider handle" is visible

title: Before/after comparison slider responds to moving the handle toward 'before'
description: Verifies the comparison can be shifted back toward the before image after moving it toward after.

steps.description: Verify element "Before/after comparison slider" is visible
Click on the "After" side of the comparison slider track
Click on the "Before" side of the comparison slider track
Verify element "Before image area" is visible
Verify element "Before/after comparison slider" is visible

title: Gallery section loads without broken-image UI
description: Verifies that gallery images render normally (no placeholder/error indicators) when assets load successfully.

steps.description: Verify element "Gallery image carousel" is visible
Verify element "Current carousel image" is visible

title: View Depoimentos section and confirm testimonials list is displayed
description: Verifies the testimonials section is reachable on the home page and shows at least one testimonial item.

steps.description: Verify element "a testimonial item" is visible

title: Expand a testimonial to view the full text
description: Verifies a testimonial can be clicked to expand and reveal the full testimonial content.

steps.description: Verify element "expanded testimonial text" is visible

title: Expand and collapse the same testimonial
description: Verifies a testimonial can be toggled between expanded and collapsed states using clicks.

steps.description: Verify element "expanded testimonial text" is visible
Click on the same testimonial item again
Verify element "expanded testimonial text" is not visible

title: Switch expansion from one testimonial to another
description: Verifies clicking a second testimonial shows its content and does not keep the first one as the visible expanded content.

steps.description: Click on a testimonial item near the top of the list
Verify element "expanded testimonial text" is visible
Click on a different testimonial item
Verify element "expanded testimonial text for the newly clicked testimonial" is visible

title: Testimonials render star ratings alongside feedback
description: Verifies that star ratings are present and visible for multiple testimonials (not only one).

steps.description: Scroll within the "Depoimentos" section to another testimonial item

title: Submit contact form successfully with all fields completed
description: Verifies a visitor can complete the appointment form and see a visible success confirmation message.

steps.description: Type "Maria Silva" into the name field
Select a service option from the service dropdown
Type "Gostaria de agendar uma avaliação." into the message field
Verify a success confirmation message is visible

title: Required field validation: missing name then successful submit after correction
description: Verifies the form blocks submission when the name is missing, then submits successfully after the field is corrected.

steps.description: Select a service option from the service dropdown
Type "Quero informações sobre valores e horários." into the message field
Verify a validation error for the missing name field is visible
Type "Ana Souza" into the name field
Verify a success confirmation message is visible

title: Required field validation: missing phone then successful submit after correction
description: Verifies the form blocks submission when the phone is missing, then submits successfully after adding the phone.

steps.description: Type "Paulo Almeida" into the name field
Select a service option from the service dropdown
Type "Preciso agendar para a próxima semana." into the message field
Verify a validation error for the missing phone field is visible
Verify a success confirmation message is visible

title: Required field validation: missing service selection then successful submit after correction
description: Verifies the form blocks submission when no service is selected and succeeds after selecting a service.

steps.description: Type "Carla Nunes" into the name field
Type "Tenho interesse em atendimento e quero agendar." into the message field
Verify a validation error for the missing service field is visible
Select a service option from the service dropdown
Verify a success confirmation message is visible

title: Required field validation: missing message then successful submit after correction
description: Verifies the form blocks submission when the message is missing and succeeds after adding a message.

steps.description: Type "Renata Lima" into the name field
Select a service option from the service dropdown
Verify a validation error for the missing message field is visible
Type "Pode ser no período da tarde." into the message field
Verify a success confirmation message is visible

title: Contact section shows key clinic contact details and address
description: Verifies the contact section presents visible clinic contact information including the address text.

steps.description: Verify text "R. Manoel Thiago de Castro, 332" is visible

title: Hero section WhatsApp button remains accessible and visible on initial load
description: Verifies the primary WhatsApp booking call-to-action is visible without scrolling on the landing page.

steps.description: Scroll to the top of the page
